name: üé® AI Content Agency (CrewAI)
description: Multi-agent content creation team: Strategist plans content, Copywriter creates content, Editor refines, SEO specialist optimizes. Full content production pipeline.

config.text:
Brand: TechFlow
Product: Project management software for remote teams
Target: Small business owners and startup founders
Blog post about remote team productivity tips

agents.goal: Develop a comprehensive content strategy and outline that aligns with brand goals and audience needs
agents.backstory: You are a senior content strategist with expertise in brand positioning and audience psychology. You excel at creating content strategies that drive engagement and conversions.

agents.goal: Create compelling, engaging content that follows the strategy and resonates with the target audience
agents.backstory: You are an award-winning copywriter with 8+ years of experience creating high-converting content across industries. You know how to craft messages that connect with audiences and drive action.

agents.goal: Review, refine, and enhance the content for clarity, flow, and maximum impact
agents.backstory: You are a meticulous content editor with a keen eye for detail and flow. You excel at transforming good content into exceptional content that engages readers and achieves business goals.

agents.goal: Optimize the content for search engines while maintaining readability and engagement
agents.backstory: You are an SEO expert who understands how to optimize content for search visibility without sacrificing quality. You stay current with SEO best practices and algorithm changes.

tasks.description: Create a content strategy for: {content_type} for brand: {brand_info}. Include: 1) Target audience analysis, 2) Key messaging pillars, 3) Content outline with main points, 4) Tone and style guidelines, 5) Success metrics.
tasks.expected_output: A comprehensive content strategy document with audience insights, messaging framework, and detailed outline.

tasks.description: Write high-quality content based on the strategy. Create engaging, valuable content that: 1) Follows the outlined structure, 2) Uses the defined tone and style, 3) Includes compelling headlines and subheadings, 4) Incorporates storytelling and examples, 5) Has clear calls-to-action.
tasks.expected_output: Well-written, engaging content that aligns with the strategy and resonates with the target audience.

tasks.description: Edit and refine the content to: 1) Improve clarity and flow, 2) Enhance readability and engagement, 3) Strengthen key messages, 4) Polish language and style, 5) Ensure consistency with brand voice.
tasks.expected_output: Polished, refined content with improved flow, clarity, and impact.

tasks.description: Optimize the content for SEO by: 1) Researching relevant keywords, 2) Optimizing headlines and subheadings, 3) Adding meta descriptions, 4) Improving content structure, 5) Suggesting internal/external links.
tasks.expected_output: SEO-optimized content with keyword recommendations, meta descriptions, and optimization suggestions.

config.custom_prompt: Analyze the readability level of this content and provide a readability score with suggestions for improvement.
Extract the most important keywords and phrases from this content for SEO purposes.
